entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the conversation, who claims to have knowledge from his brother on how to defeat You-Know-Who. He is determined to keep fighting until he succeeds or dies.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is a powerful and evil character who has won the battle, according to Harry. The identity of You-Know-Who is not explicitly stated in this conversation.

entities.name: the order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is an organization that was involved in the battle against You-Know-Who. Harry mentions that it has been finished and that anyone who pretends otherwise is kidding themselves.

relationships.description: Harry claims that You-Know-Who has won the battle, and that he (Harry) will keep fighting until he succeeds or dies.
Harry mentions that The Order of the Phoenix was involved in the battle against You-Know-Who, and that it has been finished.
